data.title: Breaking up bad assets: Can IBBI's part-resolution rewire insolvency rules?
data.description: The recent notification by the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (IBBI) allowing part-resolution of stressed assets of companies under the insolvency process has sent many resolution professionals (RPs) and committees of creditors (CoCs) back to the drawing board to reassess their strategies for resolving corporate insolvencies.
data.keywords: Business news, business news India, India business news, Indian economy news, Indian financial news
